body: so SAD they discontinued this manga and other, i were a fan of he art and the hentai,i pray they have a good life

Reliability of said information: Unknown. 
Source of information: https://e-hentai.org/g/1266114/af0ba23e66/

Unfortunately, according an other source (g.e-hentai.org), MACXE'S and monmon have discontinued this work and their other well-known work: Dinaranger. Apparently the site went down, and they left a message. 
According to Finestela from g.e-hentai.org: [He basically said that the circle "Maxce's" will cease all activities. Everything else is just your typical "thank you for your support throughout the years" and "I apologize to those who's been waiting in anticipation".]

... As someone that actually watch the Smile Precure from the start until finish, that cover and art is WAY TOO CLOSE with the actual show...

Now i can't watch the Anime without remembering this...
I'll be waiting for the next part.
